metadata.title: CVE-2024-36973 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  misc: microchip: pci1xxxx: fix double free in the error handling of gp_aux_bus_probe()  When auxiliary_device_add() returns error and then calls auxiliary_device_uninit(), callback function gp_auxiliary_device_release() calls ida_free() and kfree(aux_device_wrapper) to free memory. We should't call them again in the error handling path.  Fix this by skipping the redundant cleanup functions.
